title: Awakening
description: http://coldbloodednovels.com/R.I.P.SKYLAR ABRAHMS 5/9/1995 - 5/6/2011"Mors tua, vita mea."-Your death is my life.I was 5,842 days old when I was murdered by monsters and learned the truth about our world.The laws of science and physics, as you know them, only exist in a pocket dimension we call Earth. There are things beyond that veil that pass through, using human bodies to hunt mortals. ...and I'm one of them.---A retelling of primordial myths, the origin of monster stories, and of science that has advanced to the precipice of understanding the universe.
author: K.R. Nelson
